data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Basel-Stadt that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Basel-Stadt, Switzerland
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 194,800 people living in Basel-Stadt through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.section_summary: On average, 12 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Basel-Stadt, Switzerland.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, help the 7,810 believers in Basel-Stadt to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 186,990 lost friends and neighbors.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Basel-Stadt with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Father, help the 7,810 believers in Basel-Stadt to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Basel-Stadt, Switzerland so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Basel-Stadt, Switzerland that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ
